definition: informal terms for the nose, to hit lightly with a picking motion
details:
noun
- informal terms for the nose
= synonyms: hooter
- a beaklike, tapering tip on certain plant structures
- horny projecting mouth of a bird
= synonyms: bill
- horny, projecting mouth of animals other than birds, e.g., turtles or squid
= example: horny, projecting mouth of animals other than birds, e.g., turtles or squid
verb
- to hit lightly with a picking motion
= example: to hit lightly with a picking motion
= synonyms: pick
